verses.verse: Then came near <S%H5066><s%> the heads <S%H7218><s%> of fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> unto Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>, and unto Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%>, and unto the heads <S%H7218><s%> of fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses of the tribes <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>;

and they spake <S%H1696><s%> unto them at Shiloh <S%H7887><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> to <S%H3027><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> us cities <S%H5892><s%> to dwell in <S%H3427><s%>, with the suburbs <S%H4054><s%> thereof for our cattle <S%H929><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> unto the Levites <S%H3881><s%> out of their inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, according to the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, these cities <S%H5892><s%> with their suburbs <S%H4054><s%>.

And the lot <S%H1486><s%> came out <S%H3318><s%> for the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Kohathites <S%H6956><s%>: and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>, who were of the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, had by lot <S%H1486><s%> out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the Simeonites <S%H8099><s%>, and out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>, thirteen <S%H7969><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%>.

And the rest <S%H3498><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%> had by lot <S%H1486><s%> out of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%>, and out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%>, and out of the <S%H2677><s%> half-tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>, ten <S%H6235><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gershon <S%H1648><s%> had by lot <S%H1486><s%> out of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Issachar <S%H3485><s%>, and out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%>, and out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%>, and out of the <S%H2677><s%> half-tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> in Bashan <S%H1316><s%>, thirteen <S%H7969><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%>.

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%> had out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%>, and out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%>, and out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Zebulun <S%H2074><s%>, twelve <S%H8147><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> by lot <S%H1486><s%> unto the Levites <S%H3881><s%> these cities <S%H5892><s%> with their suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

And they gave <S%H5414><s%> out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon <S%H8095><s%>, these cities <S%H5892><s%> which are here mentioned <S%H7121><s%> by name <S%H8034><s%>:

and they were for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%>, of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Kohathites <S%H6956><s%>, who were of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%>; for theirs was the first <S%H7223><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%>.

And they gave <S%H5414><s%> them Kiriath-arba <S%H7151><s%>, which Arba <S%H704><s%> was the father <S%H1><s%> of Anak <S%H6061><s%> (the same is Hebron <S%H2275><s%>), in the hill-country <S%H2022><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, with the suburbs <S%H4054><s%> thereof round about it <S%H5439><s%>.

But the fields <S%H7704><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%>, and the villages <S%H2691><s%> thereof <S%H5414><s%>, gave they to Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh <S%H3312><s%> for his possession <S%H272><s%>.

And unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> they gave <S%H5414><s%> Hebron <S%H2275><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, the city <S%H5892><s%> of refuge <S%H4733><s%> for the manslayer <S%H7523><s%>, and Libnah <S%H3841><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%>,
and Jattir <S%H3492><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, and Eshtemoa <S%H851><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%>,
and Holon <S%H2473><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, and Debir <S%H1688><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%>,

and Ain <S%H5871><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, and Juttah <S%H3194><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, and Beth-shemesh <S%H1053><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%>; nine <S%H8672><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> out of those two <S%H8147><s%> tribes <S%H7626><s%>.
And out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>, Gibeon <S%H1391><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, Geba <S%H1387><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%>,
Anathoth <S%H6068><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, and Almon <S%H5960><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%>; four <S%H702><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%>.
All the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%>, the priests <S%H3548><s%>, were thirteen <S%H7969><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their suburbs <S%H4054><s%>.

And the families <S%H4940><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%>, the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, even the rest <S%H3498><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%>, they had the cities <S%H5892><s%> of their lot <S%H1486><s%> out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%>.

And they gave <S%H5414><s%> them Shechem <S%H7927><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%> in the hill-country <S%H2022><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%>, the city <S%H5892><s%> of refuge <S%H4733><s%> for the manslayer <S%H7523><s%>, and Gezer <S%H1507><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%>,
and Kibzaim <S%H6911><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, and Beth-horon <S%H1032><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%>; four <S%H702><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%>.
And out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%>, Elteke <S%H514><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, Gibbethon <S%H1405><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%>,
Aijalon <S%H357><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, Gath-rimmon <S%H1667><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%>; four <S%H702><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%>.

And out of the <S%H4276><s%> half-tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>, Taanach <S%H8590><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, and Gath-rimmon <S%H1667><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%>; two <S%H8147><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%>.
All the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the rest <S%H3498><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%> were ten <S%H6235><s%> with their suburbs <S%H4054><s%>.

And unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gershon <S%H1648><s%>, of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, out of the <S%H2677><s%> half-tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> they gave Golan <S%H1474><s%> in Bashan <S%H1316><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, the city <S%H5892><s%> of refuge <S%H4733><s%> for the manslayer <S%H7523><s%>, and Be-eshterah <S%H1203><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%>; two <S%H8147><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%>.
And out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Issachar <S%H3485><s%>, Kishion <S%H7191><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, Daberath <S%H1705><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%>,
Jarmuth <S%H3412><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, En-gannim <S%H5873><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%>; four <S%H702><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%>.
And out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%>, Mishal <S%H4861><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, Abdon <S%H5658><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%>,
Helkath <S%H2520><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, and Rehob <S%H7340><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%>; four <S%H702><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%>.

And out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%>, Kedesh <S%H6943><s%> in Galilee <S%H1551><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, the city <S%H5892><s%> of refuge <S%H4733><s%> for the manslayer <S%H7523><s%>, and Hammoth-dor <S%H2576><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, and Kartan <S%H7178><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%>; three <S%H7969><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%>.
All the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the Gershonites <S%H1649><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%> were thirteen <S%H7969><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their suburbs <S%H4054><s%>.

And unto the families <S%H4940><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%>, the rest <S%H3498><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Zebulun <S%H2074><s%>, Jokneam <S%H3362><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, and Kartah <S%H7177><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%>,
Dimnah <S%H1829><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, Nahalal <S%H5096><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%>; four <S%H702><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%>.
And out of the tribe of Reuben <S%H7205><s%>, Bezer <S%H1221><s%> with its suburbs <S%H3096><s%>, and Jahaz with its suburbs,
Kedemoth <S%H6932><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4158><s%>, and Mephaath with its suburbs <S%H702><s%>; four cities <S%H5892><s%>.

And out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%>, Ramoth <S%H7433><s%> in Gilead <S%H1568><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, the city <S%H5892><s%> of refuge <S%H4733><s%> for the manslayer <S%H7523><s%>, and Mahanaim <S%H4266><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%>,
Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%>, Jazer <S%H3270><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%>; four <S%H702><s%> cities in all <S%H5892><s%>.

All these were the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%>, even the rest <S%H3498><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%>; and their lot <S%H1486><s%> was twelve <S%H8147><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%>.

All the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> in the midst <S%H272><s%> of the possession <S%H272><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were forty <S%H705><s%> and eight <S%H8083><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their suburbs <S%H4054><s%>.
These cities <S%H5892><s%> were every one <S%H5892><s%> with their suburbs <S%H4054><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> them <S%H5892><s%>: thus it was with all these cities.

So Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> unto Israel <S%H3478><s%> all the land <S%H776><s%> which he sware <S%H7650><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> unto their fathers <S%H1><s%>; and they possessed <S%H3423><s%> it <S%H3427><s%>, and dwelt therein.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> gave them rest <S%H5117><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, according to all that he sware <S%H7650><s%> unto their fathers <S%H1><s%>: and there stood <S%H5975><s%> not a man <S%H376><s%> of all their enemies <S%H341><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them <S%H3068><s%>; Jehovah delivered <S%H5414><s%> all their enemies <S%H341><s%> into their hand <S%H3027><s%>.

There failed <S%H5307><s%> not aught <S%H1697><s%> of any good <S%H2896><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; all came to pass <S%H935><s%>.
